title: Bitcoin Core's 'v26.0' Upgrade Aims to Impede Eavesdropping, Tampering
description: The v26.0 upgrade contains experimental support for the v2 transport protocol as defined by Bitcoin Improvement Proposal 324 (BIP324).

title: BitTorrent's BTT Token Doubles in Value as Tron, on Which Its Issued, Hits 200M Users
description: The BTT token from BitTorrent, the file-sharing platform that Tron bought in 2018, more than doubled in price on Wednesday amid apparent optimism about the Tron blockchain.

title: Altcoins Heat Up With AVAX and HNT Leading the Way
description: Money is flowing into more speculative names following bitcoin's big run higher.

title: Bitcoin Is Surging—Is It Up Only From Here?
description: Analysts say that Bitcoin could just continue to go up in price as institutions and excitement surround a spot Bitcoin ETF have caused a rally.

title: Hong Kong regulator blocks access to two crypto entities, warning of fraud
description:
According to the securities regulator, misleading information online could encourage individuals to invest in an HKD token issued by HongKongDAO.

The Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) of Hong Kong has issued a warning related to suspected fraud involving crypto entities Hong Kong Digital Research Institute and BitCuped.

In a Dec. 6 notice, the SFC said the Hong Kong Police Force had blocked access to the websites of BitCuped and Hong Kong Digital Research Institute — also known as HongKongDAO — claiming users could be fooled into making illegitimate investments. The regulator also issued cease and desist letters to the firms’ website operators.

“The SFC suspects HongKongDAO may be disseminating false and misleading information about itself and its business through online channels,” said the Dec. 6 notice. “The SFC notes that BitCuped claims on its website that ‘Laura Cha’ and ‘Nicolas Aguzin’ serve as its Chairman and Chief Executive Officer respectively, when in fact none of them has any affiliations with BitCuped.”

Read more

title: Societe Generale becomes first bank giant to issue a stablecoin on Ethereum
description: French banking giant Societe Generale launches EUR CoinVertible (EURCV), the first bank-issued Euro stablecoin on Ethereum.

title: Worldcoin unveils $5m grant initiative for blockchain builders

title: Kaiko says beginning of altcoin season may be approaching

title: The Current US Crypto Regulatory System is Unworkable: Expert
description:

Campbell stated this while testifying before the U.S. Congress, for which he was later applauded by fellow crypto advocate John Deaton in an interview. According to Campbell, also a professor […]
